questions.ques: Did you lost access to all your control mechanisms?
Was your system remotely controlled by an attacker?
Was illegal/malacious activity being portrayed on your endscreen ?
Was your device unresponsive for the time interval?
Were you unaware about the potential onslaught on your system?
Did you recieved any abusive/offensive texts?
Were you a victim of hate speach?
Do you feel depressed/harrased after the incident?
Were you targeted by multiple people at same time?
Was your personal reputation compromised in any way?
Was large amount of money instantly deducted from your bank account?
Did you lost your ATM card?
Did you recieved any red alerts/notifications of cash withdrawal?
Did you share your pin with someone by any means?
Was the amount of money deducted more than your cards daily withdrawal limit?
Did you recieved any junk e-mails recently?
Was your Gmail account inaccessible or unresponsive?
Did your mailbox ran out of storage?
Did you by any chance cliked on a malacious link sent by unknown ID
Were your resources depleted? Did it annoy you?
Were your client credentials/sensitive information compromised?
Were you approached by any third party to discuss the account related error?
Did they asked you for the login credentials under the pretense of fixing the issue?
Were your organization funds transfered to unknown accounts?
Did the attack bring any reputational damage to your orgainization

keyword: millions of dollars of economic disruption

questions.ques: Was your parties political/ ecomonic reputation compromised?
Is there a possibilty that your adversaries/opposition may have done this to defame you?
Were your organization trade/corporate secrets revealed in public?
Was the impact of attack critical in terms of economic damage?
Were defensive capacities/security of your company diminished in anyway?
Were you associated with any online dating apps recently?
Do you know the perpetrator in person before you started recieving threats from them?
Were you asked/blackmailed for any sexual favours or indecent images in return for not leaking your personal information?
Did perpetrators actions cause any emotional/mental damage to you?
Will perpetrator actions cause any embarrasing repercussion on you if they release your information in public?

keyword: person claiming to be a legitimate representative

questions.ques: Did you recieve any call from a person claiming to be a government representative asking for your personal details?
Did they mention that you have won a lottery/gift cards and need bank details to transfer the prizepool to your account?
Did you lost your money to some unauthorized purchases you havent made?
Did you recieve any call from tech support that they have noticed unusual activity and need details to verify?
Did you recieve any spam calls from unknown numbers?
Were you facing any ping/latecy related problems on your server?
Did your clients complain about the slow and unresponsive network?
Was your servers memory buffer able to handle the packets? Did it exceed its capacity?
Did you observed any unusual/high traffic on your network recently?
Were the services/control mechanisms associated denied to you for certain time interval?
Was a small amount of money i.e (fraction of cents) deducted from your account?
Was it difficult to spot the total balance difference with minor fraction of money missing?
Did your colleagues/friends/family members face the similar amount deduction problems like you in recent events?
Did you see a rise in money deduction complains/reports recently?
Was the amount deducted documented under some legal charges like account management charges?
Did you recieve any red alerts from your windows defender/antivirus that unwanted apps found?
Did antivirus mentioned that the app consuming more resources than its actual need?
Did your personal computer felt slow/laggy or occasionally unresponsive?
Did it negatively affect your end systems health or performance?
Did you recieve any pop up after downloading a legitimate software to download additional software?
Did any governmental officer asked you for a bribery to get your work done?
Did any employee used your organizational funds for different purpose than intended or made fraudulent investemts?
Is there a possibility of corporate crimes commited against your organization without you knowing that may have affected your organization financially?
Is there a possibilty that your adversaries/opposition may have done this to defame you?
Were your agency trade secrets revealed in public? Did that cost you your company name?
Did you executed any .exe file on your computer when you accidently clicked on a malacious link?
Did you click on any pop-ups/advertisments while surfing on a website which lead to unnecessary download?
Was the data on your computer modified by any means without your knowledge?
Did you download any free to download software?
Were the system resources compromised? Did it affect your Pc's performance?
Did your system files automatically got deleted after a specific action?
Was your harddrive compromised/wiped completely? Was your OS rebooted?
Did you gave access of your computer to someone else recently?
Did your antivirus got expired? Did you not activate antivirus on your system
Were some functional elements of your system malfunctioning recently?

keyword: drivers and devices were used by someone else

questions.ques: Were access controls of your device compromised?
Was your factory assigned MAC address changed or altered by any means?
Were any of your end systems drivers exploited by outsider or intruder?
Were your network resources compromised?
Were any illegal activities committed by using your name or MAC address or spoofed my any means?
Was the server temporarily unavailable or unable to function?
Was denail of service a potential issue?
Were you successful in initiating a new real connection?
Did you not recieve any ACK packet from server after requesting for a connection?
Did server crashed abruptly?
Was your sensitive information compromised/leaked?
Did you enable two factor authentication to secure your account?
Did your account raise any red flags?
Did you share your secret/private key with anyone familiar?
Did you enable long key spaces for encryption?
Was there any delay in your communication/transactions?
Were your sensitive conversations resended to different clients/people on its own?
Did you experience any sort of repetition of your activites?
Were your message contents altered or any misinformation fed to your clients?
Did you not establish any random sesssion or unique token while completing a transaction?
Was your computer system up to date?
Did you applied any patches to reported bugs?
Were your control mechanisms exploited by any means?
Did you observe any changes in priveleges? Were higher priveleges granted to any entity beyond its level?
Did your system had any misconfigurations/design flaws previously which were ignored by you?
Did you implement SALT techniques? Were your hashing techniques outdated?
Did you add any random values to your hashed passwords?
Was your organizations active directory compromised?
Do your organization not use passwordless authentications?
Did you not enable two factor authentication?
Were priveleges granted beyond trusted agents?
Was domains administrator credentials guessed/stolen or compromised?
Was your server remotely accessed by any means?
Were hash user credentials exploited/stolen from your system?
Was your organization NTLM authentication protocol activated by user's hashed password?
Did you mispelled a legit site name in rush and entered your credentials without re-checking?
Did you clicked on any malacious/unknown url associated with the name of legit site?
Did you lost your money/data credentials after realizing it was a fake site?
Did you make any purchases on dummy website assoicated with a particular brand?
Did you enter a wrong domain extension after the brand name i.e wwwfacebook.com instead of www.facebook.com ?
Was your account/system hijacked?
Did you not set limited login attempts for user to gain access to your account?
Did you not set a two factor authentication?
Was root ssh login enabled on your system?
Did you set easy to guess passwords for login?
Did you lost access to your vaild session while you were completing your transaction?
Was considerable amount of money deducted from your account because of unauthorized purchases made?
Was this associated to one of your web application sessions?
Were you impersonated by possible attacker entity?
Did you not use complex session keys or initiate random sessions?
Was your websites doamin registar changed/altered?
Did you lost access to your site's domain name and its priveleges of domain hosting?
Did it cost any financial/reputational/regulatory damages to your company?
Did your clients compain about their data leak/misuse?
Did any third party vendor had access to your domains data?
Were you tricked into clicking a webpage element which was misdisplayed i.e A message displaying you won a lottery click here to claim your rewards?
Did any malacious script ran in your computers background when you clicked it?
Were there any bugs/loopholes in your browser which weren't fixed?
Were your funds transfered when you clicked on unknown page ibutton?
Was Javascript not disabled on your webpage? You didn't include any Frame breaker scripts?
Did you use/follow layered approaches on your device?
Were any of your device drivers malfunctioning lately?
Was your computers Wifi/Mouse/Audio/Vedio/Graphics/Printer unresponsive to your actions?
Was your operating system not up to date?
Were your driver codes recently rewritten, refactored or shimmed by any means?
Were your organizaions host routers/hubs/network resources compromised lately?
Did your host accepted response from unauthorized parties?
Was your Ip address and Mac address spoofed/ misused by external sources?
Did unknown entity had any access to your network? Was your communication altered?
Was your data stolen? Did you use HTTP channel to communicate?
Was your web service session ever authenticated without your knowledge or other any red flags raised?
Was your digital signature compromised by unknown possibly fake element or intervention?
Did someone impersonated you recently did his/her actions cost you?
Was your social security accounts password changed without your knowledge?
Did you not strongly encrypt your digital communications?
Did missing people/kidnapping/dead bodies reports increased recently?
Were many of those victims were poor people?
Were they manipulated/brainwashed to sell organs for monetary benifits?
Did perpetrators leave any trace of their activites online which were linked to dark web?
Did the criminal department recieve any illegal transplantations alerts?

keyword: calling company claiming to be me

questions.ques: Did you recieved any fraudulent call from a person claiming to be a legit representative asking for your sim card details or personal information?
Did your sim card displayed no signal abrubtly still while company network didn't display any outrage?
Did you lost your phone connection/internet services?
Were any online banking frauds committed against you by an attacker?
Was your online user profile (telecom profile) not set to private?
Did the number of drug addicts recently increased under your legislation
Was the consumption of illegal stuff like cocaine/herion/opium increased according to crime reports?
Were drug probihition campaigns not executed in your region? Were people victims of drug abuse and violation?
Were people not educated about the ill effects of drug usage?
Did crimes in your city increased this year as compared to previous year?
Were you automatically redirected to a bogus/fake site while surfing online?
Was your confidentail information/log in credentials stolen?
Did you click on any unknown link online/ recieved in your mailbox/messages?
Was your IP address compromised? Did some unknown entity impersonated you?
Did you clear your DNS cache recently?
Were you bullied on any online social media platforms?
Was someone spreading unnecessary hate and rumours about you online?
Did someone blackmailed/threatened you for sexual favours or sent you mean texts?
Do you feel depressed/stressed after the incident
Was someone rude to you online or tried to hurt you by any means?
Were you robbed of your ideas/inventions/creative expressions online?
Were your trade secrets/assets made public by unknown entity/ your adversaries or competitors in market?
Were your firewalls breached? Did it raise any red flags?
Were there any loopholes/insider threats in your organization that made have led to such assault?
Were your confidentail business agreements/documents copyrights and patents stolen/misused?
Was your crypto trading account breached? Did you lost access to it?
Was your crypto currency i.e Bitcoin/Ethereum/Litecoin transferred to a different trading account without your knowledge? Was your crypto wallet emptied?
Did you access any public networks (public wifi's) for trading/transactional process (buy/sell)?
Was your device/personal computer/smartphones/tablets used illegally to mine/steal for cryptocurrencies in stealth mode?
Was any malacious software installed on your system? Did you click on any malacious link/advertisements/ malware injected webpages?
Was your organization DNS traffic not monitered for malacious activity?
Was your client information compromised/tunneled/stolen/leaked/transferred to attackers server?
Was any covert communication channel used which may have bypassed your organizations firewall/security and ip protocols?
Were command and control mechanisms of your server compromised? Was confidential data exfiltrated?
Was javascript enabled on your server?
Were you able to trace attacks on your system easily?
Did the attack signature match any of the existing well known hacking techniques recorded in your database/ or found on internet?
Were you able to get access to your system right away after applying some counters to threat actors?
Was the damage to your organization small scale/ had least impact on your company resources?
Were the attack vectors and modus operandi of the expliot simple?
Did you recieve multiple messages from an unknown person even after you warned them not to?
Were they trying to get your attention or disturb your internal peace?
Did they came up with new accounts after you blocked their previous account?
Did you feel depressed/annoyed/stalked/stressed/watched after encountering such experience?
Were you harrassed or recieve any obscene images?
Was your website traffic disrupted? Was your website slow or unresponsive?
Were some advertisements played/ banners displayed on website which motivated any public/political cause without your knowledge?
Was your govermental organization/political party/ business targeted of unlikey rumors and not supporting social cause?
Was your website defaced/ vandalyzed of its contents?
Was your organizations sensitive information leaked in public which may have defamed you?
Was the attack against your organization politically motivated?
Did the attack strike fear in your heart or masses? Was it associated with violence?
Did this online led attack cause any physical harm to a person or body?
Did the attack fullfilled any political agenda? Was the society intimidated in executing a specific ideological goal?
Did this attack led to disruption in military installations/air traffic control/banking industry/power plants?
Did you hire a professional hacker to identify the possible loopholes and vulnerabilities in your organization
Was a non-disclosure aggrement signed with hacker when you asked him/her to lead an assault?
Did the attacker performed penetration test on your system with your knowledge?
Was an ethical aspect involved in his signature/modus operandi?
Did your organization (business/political) pay the attacker for his/her time and services?
Were you tricked by a person claiming to be a legitimate representative of an organization to reveal your personal information?
Did you gave access of your computer/system to an unknown person?
Did you put blind trust in a person/friend who you thought might be beneficail for your organization or to be your personal representative?
Were you tricked in donating for a fundraiser/ charity or for a political campaign or any other cause and later found out you have been fooled?
Did your own blind actions cost you money and time?
Did you found out that your confidental files/documents were encrypted without your knowledge and a pop up message asked for money/ransom for the decription key?
Did you recieve any call/message from an unknown person asking you for money or he/she will reveal/delete your sensitive files/information?
Did you lost access to your device/accounts? Was it locked?
The antivirus was not installed/updated on your system? The firewall was not set up/ You refrained from using VPN?
The data on your sytem was not backuped? the security patches were not implemented?
Was the impact of attack disasterous which may have cripled the organization or totally wiped off its funds?
Was any large scale online heist reported recently which was quite impossible to be carried out?
Was any legal governmental website/financial firm/bank compromised of its data and resources?
Were the attacks reported one of the most notorious crimes in this decade?
Did the lossess faced by organizations sum upto millions and billions of dollars?
Did your employess practised poor password hygenes?
Was your security system easily penetrated by an attacker?
Was there no involvement of remote server when the attack was executed
Did you had any rift/arguments with employees/ex-employess of your organization? Were there access controls revoked?
Were your employess unhappy with current state of work and job salaries paid by you? Did you create any tense work culture?
Were your sensitive details compromised changed/altered/modified mid conversation?
Was your IP address not masked? Was network communication unsecure or open?
Was the network traffic not encrypted? Was the assault difficult to identify
Was your telephone call intercepred? Did you find any bug in your OS or installed stealth microphones/cameras in your premises?
Did you follow week password habits? Were your business details privacy documents compromised?
Did the attack had a particular pattern anamolies or predictive actions/ smart behaviour analytics?
Were company logs records not monitered frequently or on timey basis? Was AI model of your organization stolen?
Was the behavioural pattern of employee esaily predicted by the attacker to comprosmise his/her credentials?
Were automated devices used to exploit your system? Was training model of your company compromised?
Was data processing pipeline of your organization under threat? Any vectors related to reverse engineering identified from it?
Was threat to your organization still vaild after applying multiple counters over a prolonged period of time?
Is your organization a start up or on small scale level?
Did the similar attack reappered even after they were countered/settled earlier?
Did you experience large chunk of data stored at places it shouldn't be?
Did you experience elevation in log ons late at night? More logins than expected?
Did you saw children appearing as models involving in sexual acts with adults on porn sites?
Did pornstars/models appeared to be under 18?
Did reports of child pornography sites increased lately
Were porn site owners accused of molestation/abuse?
Was any small/large scale sex racket busted by FBI/Crime department recently?
Did you make cheap software purchases of original software on unauthorized sites?
Was one license copy used to install a software on multiple devices?
Does it shows activate windows at bottom right side of your computer even after you made a legal purchase of device?
Was your copyrighted material duplicated imitating your brand and sold online for cheap rates?
Did you download paid games from a pirated site? Did it ask you to disable your antivirus to play the game? Was your device compromised?
Do you have bills/purchases credit card statements you dont recognize?
Were you contacted by a collection agency about your unknown debts?
Do your credit card report shows loans or purchases that you didn't request?
Do you see payments/transctions made from different location to that of your residence??
As a credit card provider does your dataset have an single entity associated with multiple credit cards or ip address?
